title: Just As I Am
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v1: Just as I am, without one plea,
But that Thy blood was shed for me,
And that Thou bid'st me come to Thee,
O Lamb of God, I come, I come!
v2: Just as I am, and waiting not
To rid my soul of one dark blot;
To Thee whose blood can cleanse each spot,
O Lamb of God, I come, I come!
v3: Just as I am, though tossed about
With many a conflict many a doubt;
O Lamb of God, I come, I come!
v4: Just as I am, poor, wretched, blind;
Sight, riches, healing of the mind;
Yes, all I need, in Thee to find,
O Lamb of God, I come, I come!
v5: Just as I am, Thou wilt receive,
O Lamb of God, I come, I come!
v6: Just as I am, Thy love unknown
Now, to be Thine, yea, Thine alone,
O Lamb of God, I come, I come!
